GK16visvsdpu:5: śarad-indu-sundara-ruciś cetasi sā me girāṃ devī /
GK16visvsdpu:6: apahṛtya tamaḥ santatam arthān akhilān prakāśayatu // VisSd_1.1 //
GK16visvsdpu:8: kāvyād eva yatas tena tat-svarūpaṃ nirūpyate // VisSd_1.2 //
GK16visvsdpu:17: vākyoccayo mahā-vākyam itthaṃ vākyaṃ dvidhā matam // VisSd_2.1 //
GK16visvsdpu:19: artho vācyaś ca lakṣyaś ca vyaṅgaś ceti tridhā matā // VisSd_2.2 //
GK16visvsdpu:21: vyaṅgyo vyañjanayā tāḥ syus tisraḥ śabdasya śaktayaḥ // VisSd_2.3 //
GK16visvsdpu:23: saṅketo gṛhyate jātau guṇa-dravya-kriyāsu ca // VisSd_2.4 //
GK16visvsdpu:25: rūḍheḥ prayojanād vāpi lakṣaṇā śaktir arpitā // VisSd_2.5 //
GK16visvsdpu:33: sādṛśyetara-saṃbandhāḥ śuddhās tāḥ sakalā api // VisSd_2.9 //
GK16visvsdpu:34: sādṛśyāt tu matā gauṇyas tena ṣoḍaśa-bhedikā /
GK16visvsdpu:35: vyaṅgyasya gūḍhāgūḍhatvād dvidhā syuḥ phala-lakṣaṇā // VisSd_2.10 //
GK16visvsdpu:37: tad evaṃ lakṣaṇābhedāś catvāriṃśan matā budhaiḥ // VisSd_2.11 //
GK16visvsdpu:40: sā vṛttir vyañjanā nāma śabdasyārthādikasya ca /
GK16visvsdpu:44: lakṣaṇopāsyate yasya kṛte tat tu prayojanam /
GK16visvsdpu:45: yayā pratyākhyāyate sā syād vyañjanā lakṣaṇāśrayā // VisSd_2.15 //
GK16visvsdpu:48: vaiśiṣṭyād anyam arthaṃ yā bodhayet sārtha-saṃbhavā /
GK16visvsdpu:49: traividhyād iyam arthānāṃ pratyekaṃ trividhā matā // VisSd_2.17 //
GK16visvsdpu:51: ekasya vyañjakatve tad anyasya sahakāritā // VisSd_2.18 //
GK16visvsdpu:53: śabdo 'pi vācakas tadval lakṣako vyañjakas tathā // VisSd_2.19 //
GK16visvsdpu:55: tātparyārthaṃ tad-arthaṃ ca vākyaṃ tad-bodhakaṃ pare // VisSd_2.20 //
GK16visvsdpu:62: rasatām eti ratyādiḥ sthāyī bhāvaḥ sa-cetasām // VisSd_3.1 //
GK16visvsdpu:67: karuṇādāv api rase jāyate yatparaṃ sukham /
GK16visvsdpu:68: sacetasām anubhavaḥ pramāṇaṃ tatra kevalam // VisSd_3.4 //
GK16visvsdpu:69: kiṃ ca teṣu yadā duḥkhaṃ na ko 'pi syāt tad-unmukhaḥ /
GK16visvsdpu:72: śoka-harṣādayo loke jāyantāṃ nāma laukikāḥ // VisSd_3.6 //
GK16visvsdpu:74: sukhaṃ sañjāyate tebhyaḥ sarvebhyo 'pīti kā kṣatiḥ // VisSd_3.7 //
GK16visvsdpu:76: na jāyate tad-āsvādo vinā raty-ādi-vāsanām // VisSd_3.8 //
GK16visvsdpu:82: sādhāraṇyena raty-ādir api tadvat pratīyate // VisSd_3.11 //
GK16visvsdpu:83: parasya na parasyeti mameti na mameti ca /
GK16visvsdpu:84: tad-āsvāde vibhāvādeḥ paricchedo na vidyate // VisSd_3.12 //
GK16visvsdpu:86: alaukikatvam eteṣāṃ bhūṣaṇaṃ na tu dūṣaṇam // VisSd_3.13 //
GK16visvsdpu:88: rasodbodhe vibhāvādyāḥ kāraṇāny eva te matāḥ // VisSd_3.14 //
GK16visvsdpu:90: tataḥ saṃvalitaḥ sarvo vibhāvādiḥ sa-cetasām // VisSd_3.15 //
GK16visvsdpu:92: sad-bhāvaś ced vibhāvāder dvayor ekasya vā bhavet // VisSd_3.16 //
GK16visvsdpu:93: jhaṭity anyasam ākṣepe tadā doṣo na vidyate /
GK16visvsdpu:95: anukāryasya ratyāder udbodho na raso bhavet /
GK16visvsdpu:101: tasmān na kāryaḥ no nityaḥ pūrva-saṃvedanojjhitaḥ /
GK16visvsdpu:102: asaṃvedana-kāle hi na bhāvo 'py asya vidyate // VisSd_3.21 //
GK16visvsdpu:107: na nirvikalpakaṃ jñānaṃ tasya grāhakam iṣyate /
GK16visvsdpu:111: tasmād alaukikaḥ satyaṃ vedyaḥ sahṛdayair ayam /
GK16visvsdpu:112: pramāṇaṃ carvaṇaivātra svābhinne viduṣāṃ matam // VisSd_3.26 //
GK16visvsdpu:116: ato 'sya sva-prakāśatvam akhaṇḍatvaṃ ca sidhyati // VisSd_3.28 //
GK16visvsdpu:119: ālambanaṃ nāyakādis tam ālambya rasodgamāt // VisSd_3.29 //
GK16visvsdpu:123: dhīra-praśānta ity ayam uktaḥ prathamaś caturbhedaḥ // VisSd_3.31 //
GK16visvsdpu:125: stheyān nigūḍhamāno dhīrodātto dṛḍha-vrataḥ kathitaḥ // VisSd_3.32 //
GK16visvsdpu:128: niścinto mṛdur aniśaṃ kalā-paro dhīra-lalitaḥ syāt /
GK16visvsdpu:129: sāmānya-guṇair bhūyān divjādiko dhīra-praśāntaḥ syāt // VisSd_3.34 //
GK16visvsdpu:131: eṣu tv aneka-mahilāsu samarāgo dakṣiṇaḥ kathitaḥ // VisSd_3.35 //
GK16visvsdpu:132: kṛtāgā api niḥśaṅkas tarjito 'pi na lajjitaḥ /
GK16visvsdpu:134: anukūla eka-nirataḥ śaṭho 'yam ekatra baddha-bhāvo yaḥ /
GK16visvsdpu:135: darśita-bahir-anurāgo vipriyam anyatra gūḍham ācarati // VisSd_3.37 //
GK16visvsdpu:137: uktā nāyaka-bhedāś catvāriṃśat tathāṣṭau ca // VisSd_3.38 //
GK16visvsdpu:139: kiñcit tad-guṇa-hīnaḥ sahāya evāsya pīṭha-mardākhyaḥ // VisSd_3.39 //
GK16visvsdpu:141: bhaktā narmasu nipuṇāḥ kupita-vadhū-māna-bhañjanāḥ śuddhāḥ // VisSd_3.40 //
GK16visvsdpu:143: veśopacāra-kuśalo vāgmī madhuro 'tha bahu-mato goṣṭhyām // VisSd_3.41 //
GK16visvsdpu:145: hāsya-karaḥ kalaha-ratir vidūṣakaḥ syāt sva-karma-jñaḥ // VisSd_3.42 //
GK16visvsdpu:146: mantrī syād arthānāṃ cintāyāṃ tadvad avarodhe /
GK16visvsdpu:149: so 'yam anūḍha-bhrātā rājñaḥ śyālaḥ śakāra ity uktaḥ // VisSd_3.44 //
GK16visvsdpu:151: ṛtvik-purodhasaḥ syur brahma-vidas tāpasās tathā dharme // VisSd_3.45 //
GK16visvsdpu:155: kārya-preṣyas tridhā dūto dūtyaś cāpi tathāvidhāḥ // VisSd_3.47 //
GK16visvsdpu:156: ubhayor bhāvam unnīya svayaṃ vadati cottaram /
GK16visvsdpu:157: suśliṣṭaṃ kurute kāryaṃ nisṛṣṭārthas tu sa smṛtaḥ // VisSd_3.48 //
GK16visvsdpu:161: lalitaudāryam ity aṣṭau sattvajāḥ pauruṣā guṇāḥ // VisSd_3.50 //
GK16visvsdpu:163: nīce ghūṇādhike spardhā yataḥ śobheti tāṃ viduḥ // VisSd_3.51 //
GK16visvsdpu:164: dhīrā dṛṣṭir gatiś citrā vilāse sasmitaṃ vacaḥ /
GK16visvsdpu:165: sāṅkṣobheṣv apy anudvego mādhuryaṃ parikīrtitam // VisSd_3.52 //
GK16visvsdpu:167: vyavasāyād acalanaṃ dhairyaṃ vighne mahaty api // VisSd_3.53 //
GK16visvsdpu:171: dānaṃ sa-priya-bhāṣaṇam audāryaṃ śatru-mitrayoḥ samatā // VisSd_3.55 //
GK16visvsdpu:172: atha nāyikā tri-bhedā svānyā sādhāraṇā strīti /
GK16visvsdpu:175: sāpi kathitā tribhedā mugdhā madhyā pragalbheti // VisSd_3.57 //
GK16visvsdpu:177: kathitā mṛduś ca māne samadhika-lajjāvatī mugdhā // VisSd_3.58 //
GK16visvsdpu:182: te dhīrā cāpy adhīrā ca dhīrādhīreti ṣaḍ-vidhe /
GK16visvsdpu:183: priyaṃ sotprāsa-vakroktyā madhyā dhīrā dahed ruṣā // VisSd_3.61 //
GK16visvsdpu:185: pragalbhā yadi dhīrā syāc channa-kopākṛtis tadā // VisSd_3.62 //
GK16visvsdpu:186: udāste surate tatra darśayanty ādarān bahiḥ /
GK16visvsdpu:187: dhīrādhīrā tu solluṇṭha-bhāṣitaiḥ khedayaty amum // VisSd_3.63 //
GK16visvsdpu:188: tarjayet tāḍayed anyā pratyekaṃ tā api dvidhā /
GK16visvsdpu:191: mugdhā tv ekaiva tena syuḥ svīyābhedās trayodaśā // VisSd_3.65 //
GK16visvsdpu:192: parakīyā dvidhā proktā paroḍhā kanyakā tathā /
GK16visvsdpu:196: nirguṇān api na dveṣṭi na rajyati guṇiṣv api /
GK16visvsdpu:197: vitta-mātraṃ samālokya sā rāgaṃ darśayed bahiḥ // VisSd_3.68 //
GK16visvsdpu:201: liṅginaś channa-kāmādyā asyāḥ prāyeṇa vallabhāḥ // VisSd_3.70 //
GK16visvsdpu:203: raktāyāṃ vā viraktāyāṃ ratam asyāṃ satyānurāgiṇī // VisSd_3.71 //
GK16visvsdpu:207: anyā vāsaka-sajjā syād virahotkaṇṭhitā tathā // VisSd_3.73 //
GK16visvsdpu:211: sā khaṇḍiteti kathitā dhīrair īrṣyā-kaṣāyitā // VisSd_3.75 //
GK16visvsdpu:213: svayaṃ vābhisaraty eṣā dhīrair uktābhisārikā // VisSd_3.76 //
GK16visvsdpu:221: mālā-pañcaḥ śmaśānaṃ ca nadyādīnāṃ taṭī tathā // VisSd_3.80 //
GK16visvsdpu:223: sthānāny aṣṭau tathā dhvānta-cchanne kutracid āśraye // VisSd_3.81 //
GK16visvsdpu:224: cāṭukāram api prāṇa-nāthaṃ roṣād apāsya yā /
GK16visvsdpu:225: paścāt tāpam avāpnoti kalahāntaritā tu sā // VisSd_3.82 //
GK16visvsdpu:226: priyaḥ kṛtvāpi saṅketaṃ yasyā nāyāti saṃnidhim /
GK16visvsdpu:227: vipralabdhā tu sā jñeyā nitāntam avamānitā // VisSd_3.83 //
GK16visvsdpu:231: sā tu vāsaka-sajjā syād vidita-priya-saṅgamā // VisSd_3.85 //
GK16visvsdpu:232: āgantuṃ kṛta-citto 'pi daivān nāyāti yat priyaḥ /
GK16visvsdpu:237: itarā apy asaṅkhyās tā noktā vistara-śaṅkayā // VisSd_3.88 //
GK16visvsdpu:240: śobhā kāntiś ca dīptiś ca m ādhuryaṃ ca pragalbhatā /
GK16visvsdpu:241: audāryaṃ dhairyam ity ete saptaiva syur ayatnajāḥ // VisSd_3.90 //
GK16visvsdpu:243: moṭṭāyitaṃ kuṭṭamitaṃ vibhramo lalitaṃ madaḥ // VisSd_3.91 //
GK16visvsdpu:244: vihṛtaṃ tapanaṃ maugdhyaṃ vikṣepaś ca kutūhalam /
GK16visvsdpu:245: hasitaṃ cakitaṃ kelir ity aṣṭādaśa-saṅkhyakāḥ // VisSd_3.92 //
GK16visvsdpu:246: svabhāvājāś ca bhāvādyā daśa puṃsāṃ bhavanty api /
GK16visvsdpu:253: kāntir evātivistīrṇā dīptir ity abhidhīyate // VisSd_3.96 //
GK16visvsdpu:255: niḥsādhvasatvaṃ prāgalbhyam audāryaṃ vinayaḥ sadā // VisSd_3.97 //
GK16visvsdpu:257: aṅgair veṣair alaṅkāraiḥ premibhir vacanair api // VisSd_3.98 //
GK16visvsdpu:269: asthāne vibhramādīnāṃ vinyāso vibhramo mataḥ // VisSd_3.104 //
GK16visvsdpu:274: ajñānād iva yā pṛcchā pratītasyāpi vastunaḥ /
GK16visvsdpu:275: vallabhasya puraḥ proktaṃ maugdhyaṃ tat-tattva-vedibhiḥ // VisSd_3.107 //
GK16visvsdpu:277: rahasyākhyānam īṣāc ca vikṣepo dayitāntike // VisSd_3.108 //
GK16visvsdpu:281: vihāre saha kāntena krīḍitaṃ kelir ucyate // VisSd_3.110 //
GK16visvsdpu:282: dṛṣṭvā darśayati vrīḍāṃ saṃmukhaṃ naiva paśyati /
GK16visvsdpu:283: pracchannaṃ vā bhramantaṃ vā-(a)tikrāntaṃ paśyati priyam // VisSd_3.111 //
GK16visvsdpu:285: sagadgada-svaraṃ kiñcit priyaṃ prāyeṇa bhāṣate // VisSd_3.112 //
GK16visvsdpu:286: anyaiḥ pravartitāṃ śaśvat sāvadhānā ca tat-kathām /
GK16visvsdpu:287: śṛṇoty anyatra dattākṣī priye bālānurāgiṇī // VisSd_3.113 //
GK16visvsdpu:288: cirāya savidhe sthānaṃ priyasya bahu manyate /
GK16visvsdpu:289: vilocana-pathaṃ cāsya na gacchaty analaṅkṛtā // VisSd_3.114 //
GK16visvsdpu:291: bāhu-mūlaṃ stanau nābhi-paṅkajaṃ darśayet sphuṭam // VisSd_3.115 //
GK16visvsdpu:293: viśvasity asya mitreṣu bahu-mānaṃ karoti ca // VisSd_3.116 //
GK16visvsdpu:294: sakhī-madhye guṇān brūte sva-dhanaṃ pradadāti ca /
GK16visvsdpu:295: supte svapiti duḥkhe 'sya duḥkhaṃ dhatte sukhe sukham // VisSd_3.117 //
GK16visvsdpu:298: yat kiñcid api saṃvīkṣya kurute hasitaṃ mudhā /
GK16visvsdpu:300: jṛmbhate sphoṭayaty aṅgaṃ bālam āśliṣya cumbati /
GK16visvsdpu:301: bhāle tathā vayasyāyā racayet tilaka-kriyām // VisSd_3.120 //
GK16visvsdpu:303: daśati svādharaṃ cāpi brūte priyam adhomukhī // VisSd_3.121 //
GK16visvsdpu:304: na muñcati ca taṃ deśaṃ nāyako yatra dṛśyate /
GK16visvsdpu:305: āgacchati gṛhaṃ tasya kārya-vyājena kenacit // VisSd_3.122 //
GK16visvsdpu:306: dattaṃ kim api kāntena dhṛtvāṅge muhur īkṣate /
GK16visvsdpu:307: nityaṃ hṛṣyati tad-yoge viyoge malinā kṛśā // VisSd_3.123 //
GK16visvsdpu:308: manyate bahu tac-chīlaṃ tat-priyaṃ manyate priyam /
GK16visvsdpu:309: prārthayaty alpa-mūlyāni suptā na parivartate // VisSd_3.124 //
GK16visvsdpu:311: bhāṣate sūnṛtaṃ snigdhām anuraktā nitambinī // VisSd_3.125 //
GK16visvsdpu:317: dūtyaḥ sakhī naṭī dāsī dhātreyī prativeśinī // VisSd_3.128 //
GK16visvsdpu:318: bālā pravrajitā kārūḥ śilpinyādyāḥ svayaṃ tathā /
GK16visvsdpu:319: kalā-kauśalam utsāho bhaktiś cittajñatā smṛtiḥ // VisSd_3.129 //
GK16visvsdpu:323: uddīpana-vibhāvās te rasam uddīpayanti ye // VisSd_3.131 //
GK16visvsdpu:325: udbuddhaṃ kāraṇaiḥ svaiḥ svari bahir bhāvaṃ prakāśayan // VisSd_3.132 //
GK16visvsdpu:327: uktāḥ strīṇām alaṅkārā aṅgajāś ca svabhāvajāḥ // VisSd_3.133 //
GK16visvsdpu:328: tad-rūpāḥ sāttvikā bhāvās tathā ceṣṭāḥ parā api /
GK16visvsdpu:331: stambhaḥ svedo 'tha romāñcaḥ svara-bhaṅgo 'tha vepathuḥ // VisSd_3.135 //
GK16visvsdpu:332: vaivarṇyam aśru-pralaya ity aṣṭau sāttvikāḥ smṛtāḥ /
GK16visvsdpu:342: sthāyiny unmagna-nirmagnās trayastriṃśac ca tad-bhidāḥ // VisSd_3.140 //
GK16visvsdpu:343: nirvedāvega-dainya-śrama-mada-jaḍatā augrya-mohau vibodhaḥ svapnāpasmāra-garvā maraṇam alasatāmarṣa-nidrāvahitthāḥ |
GK16visvsdpu:344: autsukyonmāda-śaṅkāḥ smṛti-mati-sahitā vyādhi-satrāsa-lajjā harṣāsūyā-viṣādāḥ sadhṛti-capalatā glāni-cintā-vitarkāḥ // VisSd_3.141 //
GK16visvsdpu:351: iṣṭād dharṣāḥ śuco 'niṣṭāj jñeyāś cānye yathāyatham /
GK16visvsdpu:355: amunā cottamaḥ śete madhyo hasati gāyati /
GK16visvsdpu:356: adhama-prakṛtiś cāpi paruṣaṃ vakti roditi // VisSd_3.147 //
GK16visvsdpu:365: svapno nidrām upetasya viṣayānubhavas tu yaḥ /
GK16visvsdpu:388: smeratā dhṛti-satoṣau bahu-mānaś ca tad-bhavāḥ // VisSd_3.163 //
GK16visvsdpu:406: śṛṅgāra-vīrayor hāso vīre krodhas tathā mataḥ // VisSd_3.172 //
GK16visvsdpu:408: ity ādy-anyat samunnateyaṃ tathā bhāvita-buddhibhiḥ // VisSd_3.173 //
GK16visvsdpu:409: aviruddhā viruddhā vā yaṃ tirodhātum akṣamāḥ /
GK16visvsdpu:411: ratir hāsaś ca śokaś ca krodhotsāhau bhayaṃ tathā /
GK16visvsdpu:412: jugupsā vismayaś cettham aṣṭau proktāḥ śamo 'pi ca // VisSd_3.175 //
GK16visvsdpu:418: raudra-śaktyā tu janitaṃ citta-vaiklavyaṃ bhayam // VisSd_3.178 //
GK16visvsdpu:421: visphāraś cetaso yas tu sa vismaya udāhṛtaḥ /
GK16visvsdpu:424: tasmād bhāvā amī proktāḥ sthāyi-sañcāri-sāttvikāḥ // VisSd_3.181 //
GK16visvsdpu:426: bībhatso 'dbhuta ity aṣṭau rasāḥ śāntas tathā mataḥ // VisSd_3.182 //
GK16visvsdpu:430: ālambanaṃ nāyikāḥ syur dakṣiṇādyāś ca nāyakam // VisSd_3.184 //
GK16visvsdpu:435: vipralambho 'tha saṃbhoga ity eṣa dvividho mataḥ // VisSd_3.186 //
GK16visvsdpu:436: yatra tu ratiḥ prakṛṣṭā nābhīṣṭam upaitai vipralambho 'sau /
GK16visvsdpu:437: sa ca pūrva-rāga-māna-pravāsa-karuṇātmakaś caturdhā syāt // VisSd_3.187 //
GK16visvsdpu:439: daśā-viśeṣo yo 'prāptau pūrvarāgaḥ sa ucyate // VisSd_3.188 //
GK16visvsdpu:441: indrajāle ca citre ca sākṣāt svapne ca darśanam // VisSd_3.189 //
GK16visvsdpu:443: unmādo 'tha vyādhir jaḍatā mṛtir iti daśātra kāma-daśāḥ // VisSd_3.190 //
GK16visvsdpu:450: jāta-prāyaṃ tu tad vācyaṃ cetasākāṅkṣitaṃ tathā /
GK16visvsdpu:451: varṇyate 'pi yadi pratyuj-jīvanaṃ syād adūrataḥ // VisSd_3.194 //
GK16visvsdpu:452: ādau vācyaḥ striyā rāgaḥ puṃsaḥ paścāt tad-iṅgitaiḥ /
GK16visvsdpu:453: nīlī kusumbhaṃ mañjiṣṭhā pūrvarāgo 'pi ca tridhā // VisSd_3.195 //
GK16visvsdpu:454: na cātiśobhate yan nāpaiti prema manogatam /
GK16visvsdpu:455: tan nīlī-rāgam ākhyātaṃ yathā śrī-rāma-sītayoḥ // VisSd_3.196 //
GK16visvsdpu:456: kusumbha-rāgaṃ tat prāhur yad apaiti ca śobhate /
GK16visvsdpu:457: mañjiṣṭhā-rāgam āhus tad yan nāpaity atiśobhate // VisSd_3.197 //
GK16visvsdpu:458: mānaḥ kopaḥ sa tu dvedhā praṇayerṣyā-samudbhavaḥ /
GK16visvsdpu:459: dvayoḥ praṇayamānaḥ syāt pramode sumahaty api // VisSd_3.198 //
GK16visvsdpu:460: premṇaḥ kuṭila-gāmitvāt kopo yaḥ kāraṇaṃ vinā /
GK16visvsdpu:462: īrṣyāmāno bhavet strīṇāṃ tatratv anumitis tridhā /
GK16visvsdpu:464: sāma bhedo 'tha dānaṃ ca naty-upekṣe rasāntaram /
GK16visvsdpu:465: tad-bhaṅgāya patiḥ kuryāt ṣaḍ-upāyān iti kramāt // VisSd_3.201 //
GK16visvsdpu:467: dānaṃ vyājena bhūṣādeḥ pādayoḥ patanaṃ natiḥ // VisSd_3.202 //
GK16visvsdpu:470: pravāso bhinna-deśitvaṃ kāryāc chāpāc ca saṃbhramāt /
GK16visvsdpu:473: aṅgeṣv asauṣṭhavaṃ tāpaḥ pāṇḍutā kṛśatāruciḥ // VisSd_3.205 //
GK16visvsdpu:475: mṛtiś ceti kramāj jñeyā daśa smara-daśā iha // VisSd_3.206 //
GK16visvsdpu:480: bhāvī bhavan bhūta iti tridhā syāt tatra kāryajaḥ // VisSd_3.208 //
GK16visvsdpu:481: yūnor ekatarasmin gatavati lokāntaraṃ punar alabhye /
GK16visvsdpu:482: vimanāyate yadaikas tato bhavet karuṇa-vipralambhākhyaḥ // VisSd_3.209 //
GK16visvsdpu:486: ayam eka eva dhīraiḥ kathitaḥ saṃbhoga-śṛṅgāraḥ // VisSd_3.211 //
GK16visvsdpu:489: anulepana-bhūṣāḍyā vācyaṃ śuci medhyam anyac ca /
GK16visvsdpu:490: kathitaś caturvidho 'sāv ānantaryāt tu pūrva-rāgādeḥ // VisSd_3.213 //
GK16visvsdpu:494: tam atrālambanaṃ prāhus tac-ceṣṭoddīpanaṃ matam // VisSd_3.215 //
GK16visvsdpu:498: nīcānām apahasitaṃ tathātihasitaṃ tad eṣa ṣaḍ-bhedaḥ // VisSd_3.217 //
GK16visvsdpu:500: kiñcil lakṣa-dvijaṃ tatra hasitaṃ kathitaṃ budhaiḥ // VisSd_3.218 //
GK16visvsdpu:502: apahasitaṃ sāsrākṣaṃ vikṣiptāṅgaṃ ca bhavaty atihasitam // VisSd_3.219 //
GK16visvsdpu:503: yasya hāsaḥ sa cet kvāpi sākṣān naiva nibadhyate /
GK16visvsdpu:509: śoko 'tra sthāyi-bhāvaḥ syāc chocyam ālambanaṃ matam /
GK16visvsdpu:510: tasya dāhādikāvasthā bhaved uddīpanaṃ punaḥ // VisSd_3.223 //
GK16visvsdpu:518: ālambanam aris tasya tac ceṣṭoddīpanaṃ matam // VisSd_3.227 //
GK16visvsdpu:531: anubhāvās tu tatra syuḥ sahāyānveṣaṇādayaḥ // VisSd_3.233 //
GK16visvsdpu:533: sa ca dāna-dharma-yuddhair dayayā ca samanvitaś caturdhā syāt // VisSd_3.234 //
GK16visvsdpu:536: yasmād utpadyate bhītis tad atrālambanaṃ matam /
GK16visvsdpu:537: ceṣṭā ghoratarās tasya bhaved uddīpanaṃ punaḥ // VisSd_3.236 //
GK16visvsdpu:547: anubhāvās tatra matās tathā syur vyabhicāriṇaḥ // VisSd_3.241 //
GK16visvsdpu:551: guṇānāṃ tasya mahimā bhaved uddīpanaṃ punaḥ // VisSd_3.243 //
GK16visvsdpu:561: romāñcādyāś cānubhāvās tathā syur vyabhicāriṇaḥ // VisSd_3.248 //
GK16visvsdpu:564: yukta-viyukta-daśāyām avasthito yaḥ śamaḥ sa eva yataḥ /
GK16visvsdpu:565: rasatām eti tad asmin sañcāryādeḥ sthitiś ca na viśuddhā // VisSd_3.250 //
GK16visvsdpu:566: sphuṭaṃ camatkāritayā vatsalaṃ ca rasaṃ viduḥ /
GK16visvsdpu:567: sthāyī vatsalatā snehaḥ putrādy-ālambanaṃ matam // VisSd_3.251 //
GK16visvsdpu:577: bhayānakena śāntena tathā vīra-rasaḥ smṛtaḥ // VisSd_3.256 //
GK16visvsdpu:580: śṛṅgāreṇa tu bībhatsa ity ākhyātā virodhitā /
GK16visvsdpu:581: kuto 'pi kāraṇāt kvāpi sthiratām upayann api // VisSd_3.258 //
GK16visvsdpu:582: unmādādir na tu sthāyī na pātre sthairyam eti yat /
GK16visvsdpu:584: sandhiḥ śabalatā ceti sarve 'pi rasanād rasāḥ /
GK16visvsdpu:586: udbuddha-mātraḥ sthāyī ca bhāva ity abhidhīyate /
GK16visvsdpu:588: udrekaḥ kasyacit kvāpi tathā sañcāriṇo rase /
GK16visvsdpu:594: śānte ca hīna-niṣṭhe gurv-ādy ālambane hāsye /
GK16visvsdpu:597: bhāvābhāso lajjādike tu veśyādi-viṣaye syāt // VisSd_3.266 //
GK16visvsdpu:599: bhāvasya śāntir udayaḥ sandhiḥ śabalatā matā // VisSd_3.267 //
GK16visvsdpu:606: kāvyaṃ dhvanir guṇībhūta-vyaṅgaṃ ceti dvidhā matā /
GK16visvsdpu:607: vācyātiśayini vyaṅgyo dhvanis tat kāvyam uttamam // VisSd_4.1 //
GK16visvsdpu:608: bhedau dhvaner api dvāv udīritau lakṣaṇābhidhā-mūlau /
GK16visvsdpu:613: asaṃlakṣya-kramo yatra vyaṅgyo lakṣya-kramas tathā // VisSd_4.4 //
GK16visvsdpu:616: eko 'pi bhedo 'nantatvāt saṅkhyeyas tasya naiva yat // VisSd_4.5 //
GK16visvsdpu:618: dhvanir lakṣya-krama-vyaṅgyas trividhaḥ kathito budhaiḥ // VisSd_4.6 //
GK16visvsdpu:620: vastu vālaṅkṛtir veti dvidhārthaḥ saṃbhavī svataḥ // VisSd_4.7 //
GK16visvsdpu:621: kaveḥ prauḍhokti-sikto vā tan nibaddhasya veti ṣaṭ /
GK16visvsdpu:622: ṣaḍbhis tair vyajyamānas tu vastv alaṅkāra-rūpakaḥ // VisSd_4.8 //
GK16visvsdpu:624: ekaḥ śabdārtha-śakty-utthe tad aṣṭadaśadhā dhvaniḥ // VisSd_4.9 //
GK16visvsdpu:626: prabandhe 'pi mato dhīrair artha-śakty-udbhavo dhvaniḥ // VisSd_4.10 //
GK16visvsdpu:628: tad evam eka-pañcāśad bhedās tasya dhvaner matāḥ // VisSd_4.11 //
GK16visvsdpu:631: aparaṃ tu guṇī-bhūta-vyaṅgyaṃ vācyād anuttame vyaṅgye /
GK16visvsdpu:632: tatra syād itarāṅgaṃ kākvākṣiptaṃ ca vācya-siddha-vyaṅgyam // VisSd_4.13 //
GK16visvsdpu:634: vyaṅgyam asundaram evaṃ bhedās tasyoditā aṣṭau // VisSd_4.14 //
GK16visvsdpu:642: aṅgīkāryā turyā vṛttir bodhe rasādīnām // VisSd_5.1 //
GK16visvsdpu:645: prāg asattvād rasāder no bodhike lakṣaṇābhidhe /
GK16visvsdpu:646: kiṃ ca mukhyārtha-bādhasya virahād api lakṣaṇā // VisSd_5.3 //
GK16visvsdpu:648: ābhāsatvena hetūnāṃ smṛtir na ca rasādi-dhīḥ // VisSd_5.4 //
GK16visvsdpu:649: sā ceyaṃ vyañjanā-nāma vṛttir ity ucyate budhaiḥ /
GK16visvsdpu:650: rasa-vyaktau punar vṛttiṃ rasanākhyāṃ pare viduḥ // VisSd_5.5 //
GK16visvsdpu:658: dṛśyaṃ tatrābhineyaṃ tad-rūpāropāt tu rūpakam // VisSd_6.1 //
GK16visvsdpu:660: āṅgiko vācikaś caivam āhāryaḥ sāttvikas tathā // VisSd_6.2 //
GK16visvsdpu:662: īhāmṛgāṅka-vīthyaḥ prahasanam iti rūpakāṇi daśa // VisSd_6.3 //
GK16visvsdpu:666: durmallikā prakaraṇī hallīśako bhāṇiketi ca // VisSd_6.5 //
GK16visvsdpu:668: vinā viśeṣaṃ sarveṣāṃ lakṣma nāṭakavan matam // VisSd_6.6 //
GK16visvsdpu:674: divyo 'tha divyādivyo vā guṇavān nāyako mataḥ // VisSd_6.9 //
GK16visvsdpu:675: eka eva bhaved aṅgī śṛṅgāro vīra eva vā /
GK16visvsdpu:676: aṅgam anye rasāḥ sarve kāryo nirvahaṇe 'dbhutaḥ // VisSd_6.10 //
GK16visvsdpu:678: gopucchāgra-samāgraṃ tu bandhanaṃ tasya kīrtitam // VisSd_6.11 //
GK16visvsdpu:682: yukto na bahubhiḥ kāryair bīja-saṃhṛtimān na ca // VisSd_6.13 //
GK16visvsdpu:686: āsanna-nāyakaḥ pātrair yuktas tri-caturais tathā // VisSd_6.15 //
GK16visvsdpu:688: vivāho bhojanaṃ śāpotsargau mṛtyū rataṃ tathā // VisSd_6.16 //
GK16visvsdpu:689: danta-cchedyaṃ nakha-cchedyam anyad vrīḍākaraṃ ca yat /
GK16visvsdpu:696: aṅko 'paraḥ sa garbhāṅkaḥ sa-bījaḥ phalavān api // VisSd_6.20 //
GK16visvsdpu:697: tatra pūrvaṃ pūrva-raṅgaḥ sabhā-pūjā tataḥ param /
GK16visvsdpu:700: kuśīlavāḥ prakurvanti pūrva-raṅgaḥ sa ucyate // VisSd_6.22 //
GK16visvsdpu:702: tathāpy avaśyaṃ kartavyā nāndī vighnopaśāntaye // VisSd_6.23 //
GK16visvsdpu:706: padair yuktā dvādaśabhir aṣṭābhir vā padair uta // VisSd_6.25 //
GK16visvsdpu:708: praviśya sthāpakas tadvat kāvyam āsthāpayet tataḥ // VisSd_6.26 //
GK16visvsdpu:709: divya-martye sa tad-rūpo miśram anyataras tayoḥ /
GK16visvsdpu:710: sūcayed vastu bījaṃ vā mukhaṃ pātram athāpi vā // VisSd_6.27 //
GK16visvsdpu:712: rūpakasya kaver ākhyāṃ gotrādyāpi sa kīrtayet // VisSd_6.28 //
GK16visvsdpu:713: ṛtuṃ ca kañcit prāyeṇa bhāratīṃ vṛttim āśritaḥ /
GK16visvsdpu:717: naṭī vidūṣāko vāpi pāripārśvika eva vā /
GK16visvsdpu:718: sūtradhāreṇa sahitāḥ saṃlāpaṃ yatra kurvate // VisSd_6.31 //
GK16visvsdpu:720: āmukhaṃ tat tu vijñeyaṃ nāmnā prastāvanāpi sā // VisSd_6.32 //
GK16visvsdpu:724: yojayanti padair anyaiḥ sa uddhātyaka ucyate // VisSd_6.34 //
GK16visvsdpu:725: sūtradhārasya vākyaṃ vā samādāyārtham asya vā /
GK16visvsdpu:726: bhavet pātra-praveśaś cet kathodghātaḥ sa ucyate // VisSd_6.35 //
GK16visvsdpu:728: tena pātra-praveśaś cet prayogātiśayas tadā // VisSd_6.36 //
GK16visvsdpu:729: kālaṃ pravṛttam āśritya sūtra-dhṛg yatra varṇayet /
GK16visvsdpu:730: tad-āśrayaś ca pātrasya praveśas tat-pravartakam // VisSd_6.37 //
GK16visvsdpu:732: prayoge khalu taj jñeyaṃ nāmnāvalagitaṃ budhaiḥ // VisSd_6.38 //
GK16visvsdpu:734: nepathoktaṃ śrutaṃ yatra tv ākāśa-vacanaṃ tathā // VisSd_6.39 //
GK16visvsdpu:736: eṣām āmukha-bhedānām ekaṃ kañcit prayojayet // VisSd_6.40 //
GK16visvsdpu:737: tenārtham atha pātraṃ vā samākṣipyaiva sūtra-dhṛk /
GK16visvsdpu:738: prastāvanānte nirgacchet tato vastu prayojayet // VisSd_6.41 //
GK16visvsdpu:739: idaṃ punar vastu budhair dvividhaṃ parikalpyate /
GK16visvsdpu:740: ādhikārikam ekaṃ syāt prāsaṅgikam athāparam // VisSd_6.42 //
GK16visvsdpu:741: adhikāraḥ phale svāmyam adhikārī ca tat-prabhuḥ /
GK16visvsdpu:746: āgantukena bhāvena patākā-sthānakaṃ tu tat // VisSd_6.45 //
GK16visvsdpu:751: arthopakṣepakaṃ yat tu līnaṃ sa-vinayaṃ bhavet /
GK16visvsdpu:755: yat syād anucitaṃ vastu nāyakasya rasasya vā /
GK16visvsdpu:756: viruddhaṃ tat parityājyam anyathā vā prakalpayet // VisSd_6.50 //
GK16visvsdpu:757: aṅkeṣv adarśanīyā yā vaktavyaiva ca saṃmatā /
GK16visvsdpu:758: yā ca syād varṣa-paryantaṃ kathā dina-dvayādijā // VisSd_6.51 //
GK16visvsdpu:759: anyā ca vistarā sūcyā sārthopakṣepair budhaiḥ /
GK16visvsdpu:760: varṣād ūrdhvaṃ tu yad vastu tat syād varṣād adhobhavam // VisSd_6.52 //
GK16visvsdpu:762: arthopakṣepakair vācyam aṅka-cchedaṃ vidhāya tat // VisSd_6.53 //
GK16visvsdpu:764: cūlikāṅkāvatāro 'tha syād aṅka-mukham ity api // VisSd_6.54 //
GK16visvsdpu:766: saṅkṣiptārthas tu viṣkambha ādāv aṅkasya darśitaḥ // VisSd_6.55 //
GK16visvsdpu:768: śuddhaḥ syāt sa tu saṅkīrṇo nīca-madhyama-kalpitaḥ // VisSd_6.56 //
GK16visvsdpu:770: aṅka-dvayāntar vijñeyaḥ śeṣaṃ viṣkambhake yathā // VisSd_6.57 //
GK16visvsdpu:774: yatra syād aṅka ekasminn aṅkānāṃ sūcanākhilā // VisSd_6.59 //
GK16visvsdpu:775: tad-aṅka-mukham ity āhur bījārtha-khyāpakaṃ ca tat /
GK16visvsdpu:778: yadā sandarśayec cheṣam āmukhānantaraṃ tadā // VisSd_6.61 //
GK16visvsdpu:780: yadā tu sarasaṃ vastu mūlād eva pravartate // VisSd_6.62 //
GK16visvsdpu:782: viṣkambhakādyair api no vadho vācyo 'dhikāriṇaḥ // VisSd_6.63 //
GK16visvsdpu:784: bījaṃ binduḥ patākā ca prakarī kāryam eva ca // VisSd_6.64 //
GK16visvsdpu:786: alpa-mātraṃ samuddiṣṭaṃ bahudhā yad visarpati // VisSd_6.65 //
GK16visvsdpu:787: phalasya prathamo hetur bījaṃ tad abhidhīyate /
GK16visvsdpu:790: patākā-nāyakasya syān na svakīyaṃ phalāntaram // VisSd_6.67 //
GK16visvsdpu:791: garbhe sandhau vimarśe vā virvāhas tasya jāyate /
GK16visvsdpu:792: prāsaṅgikaṃ pradeśasthaṃ caritaṃ prakarī matā // VisSd_6.68 //
GK16visvsdpu:793: prakarī nāyakasya syān na svakīyaṃ phalāntaram /
GK16visvsdpu:794: apekṣitaṃ tu yat sādhyam ārambho yan nibandhanaḥ // VisSd_6.69 //
GK16visvsdpu:795: samāpanaṃ tu yat-siddhyai tat kāryam iti saṃmatam /
GK16visvsdpu:796: avasthāḥ pañca kāryasya prārabdhasya phalārthibhiḥ // VisSd_6.70 //
GK16visvsdpu:798: bhaved ārabhya autsukyaṃ yan mukhya-phala-siddhaye // VisSd_6.71 //
GK16visvsdpu:802: sāvasthā phala-yogaḥ syād yaḥ samagra-phalodayaḥ // VisSd_6.73 //
GK16visvsdpu:803: yathā-saṅkhyam avasthābhir ābhir yogāt tu pañcabhiḥ /
GK16visvsdpu:804: pañcadhaivetivṛttasya bhāgāḥ syuḥ pañca sandhayaḥ // VisSd_6.74 //
GK16visvsdpu:806: mukhaṃ pratimukhaṃ garbho vimarśa upasaṃhṛtiḥ // VisSd_6.75 //
GK16visvsdpu:807: iti pañcāsya bhedāḥ syuḥ kramāl lākṣaṇam ucyate /
GK16visvsdpu:811: lakṣyālakṣya ivodbhedo yatra pratimukhaṃ ca tat /
GK16visvsdpu:815: śāpādyaiḥ sāntarāyaś ca sa vimarśa iti smṛtaḥ /
GK16visvsdpu:817: ekārtham upanīyante yatra nirvahaṇaṃ hi tat /
GK16visvsdpu:820: udbhedaḥ karaṇaṃ bheda etāny aṅgāni vai mukhe // VisSd_6.82 //
GK16visvsdpu:824: saṃpradhāraṇam arthānāṃ yuktiḥ prāptiḥ sukhāgamaḥ // VisSd_6.84 //
GK16visvsdpu:825: bījasyāgamanaṃ yat tu tat samādhānam ucyate /
GK16visvsdpu:826: sukha-duḥkha-kṛto yo 'rthas tad vidhānam iti smṛtam // VisSd_6.85 //
GK16visvsdpu:828: bījārthasya prarohaḥ syād udbhedaḥ karaṇaṃ punaḥ // VisSd_6.86 //
GK16visvsdpu:830: vilāsaḥ parisarpaś ca vidhutaṃ tāpanaṃ tathā // VisSd_6.87 //
GK16visvsdpu:831: narma narma-dyutiś caiva tathā pragamanaṃ punaḥ /
GK16visvsdpu:832: virodhaś ca pratimukhe tathā syāt paryupāsanam // VisSd_6.88 //
GK16visvsdpu:833: puṣpaṃ vajram upanyāso varṇa-saṃhāra ity api /
GK16visvsdpu:834: samīhā rati-bhogārthā vilāsa iti kathyate // VisSd_6.89 //
GK16visvsdpu:837: upāyādarśanaṃ yat tu tāpanaṃ nāma tad bhavet /
GK16visvsdpu:838: parihāsa-vaco narma dhṛtis tu parihāsa-jā // VisSd_6.91 //
GK16visvsdpu:845: saṅgrahaś cānumānaṃ ca prārthanā kṣiptir eva ca /
GK16visvsdpu:846: troṭakādhibalodvegā garbhe syur vidravas tathā // VisSd_6.95 //
GK16visvsdpu:848: tattvārtha-kathanaṃ mārgo rūpaṃ vākyaṃ vitarkavat // VisSd_6.96 //
GK16visvsdpu:850: bhāva-tattvopalabdhis tu kramaḥ syāt saṅgrahaḥ punaḥ // VisSd_6.97 //
GK16visvsdpu:852: rati-harṣotsavānāṃ tu prārthanaṃ prārthanā bhavet // VisSd_6.98 //
GK16visvsdpu:853: rahasyārthasya tad-bhedaḥ kṣiptiḥ syāt toṭakaṃ punaḥ /
GK16visvsdpu:858: śaktiḥ prasaṅgaḥ khedaś ca pratiṣedho virodhanam // VisSd_6.101 //
GK16visvsdpu:859: prarocanā vimarśe syād ādānaṃ chādanaṃ tathā /
GK16visvsdpu:863: tarjanodvejane proktā dyutih śaktiḥ punar bhavet /
GK16visvsdpu:865: manaś ceṣṭā-samutpannaḥ śramaḥ kheda iti smṛtaḥ /
GK16visvsdpu:869: kārya-saṅgraha ādānaṃ tad āhuś chādanaṃ punaḥ /
GK16visvsdpu:870: kāryārtham apamānādeḥ sahanaṃ khalu yad bhavet // VisSd_6.107 //
GK16visvsdpu:872: kṛtiḥ prasāda ānandaḥ samayo 'py upagūhanam // VisSd_6.108 //
GK16visvsdpu:873: bhāṣaṇaṃ pūrva-vākyaṃ ca kāvya-saṃhāra eva ca /
GK16visvsdpu:874: praśastir iti saṃhāre jñeyāny aṅgāni nāmataḥ // VisSd_6.109 //
GK16visvsdpu:876: upanāyasas tu kāryāṇāṃ grathanaṃ nirṇayaḥ punaḥ // VisSd_6.110 //
GK16visvsdpu:880: samayo duḥkha-niryāṇaṃ tad bhaved upagūhanam // VisSd_6.112 //
GK16visvsdpu:885: catuḥ-ṣaṣṭi-vidhaṃ hy etad aṅgaṃ proktaṃ manīṣibhiḥ /
GK16visvsdpu:886: kuryād aniyate tasya sandhāv api niveśanam // VisSd_6.115 //
GK16visvsdpu:890: prakāśanaṃ prakāśyānām aṅgānāṃ ṣaḍ-vidhaṃ phalam // VisSd_6.117 //
GK16visvsdpu:892: aṅga-hīnaṃ tathā kāvyaṃ na prayogāya yujyate // VisSd_6.118 //

GK16visvsdpu:934: anyonyāmantraṇaṃ yat syāt taj-janānte janāntikam // VisSd_6.139 //
GK16visvsdpu:935: kiṃ bravīṣīti yan-nāṭye vinā pātraṃ prayujyate /

GK16visvsdpu:937: dattāṃ siddhāṃ ca senāṃ ca veśyānāṃ nāma darśayet /

GK16visvsdpu:939: vasantādiṣu varṇyasya vastuno nāma yad bhavet /

GK16visvsdpu:944: rājā svāmīti deveti bhṛtyair bhaṭṭeti cādhamaiḥ // VisSd_6.144 //

GK16visvsdpu:947: svecchayā nāmabhir viprair vipra āryeti cetaraiḥ /

GK16visvsdpu:950: sūtradhāraṃ vaded bhāva iti vai pāripārśvikaḥ // VisSd_6.147 //
GK16visvsdpu:951: sūtradhāro māriṣeti haṇḍe ity adhamaiḥ samāḥ /

GK16visvsdpu:954: vaded rājñīṃ ca ceṭīṃ ca bhavatīti vidūṣakaḥ // VisSd_6.149 //
GK16visvsdpu:955: āyuṣman rathinaṃ sūto vṛddhaṃ tāteti cetaraḥ /

GK16visvsdpu:958: viprair ayam amātyeti saciveti ca bhaṇyate // VisSd_6.151 //
GK16visvsdpu:959: sādho iti tapasvī ca praśāntaś cocyate budhaiḥ /
GK16visvsdpu:962: svāmīti yuvarājas tu kumāro bhartṛ-dārakaḥ // VisSd_6.153 //
GK16visvsdpu:964: vācyā prakṛtibhī rājñaḥ kumārī bhartṛ-dārikā // VisSd_6.154 //

GK16visvsdpu:967: kuṭṭiny ambety anugatiḥ pūjyā ca jaratī janaiḥ /
GK16visvsdpu:968: āmantraṇaiś ca pāṣāṇḍā vācyāḥ svasamayāgataiḥ // VisSd_6.156 //
GK16visvsdpu:970: yasya yat karma śilpaṃ vā vidyā vā jātir eva vā // VisSd_6.157 //
GK16visvsdpu:971: tenaiva nāmnā vācyo 'sau jñeyāś cānye yathocitam /

GK16visvsdpu:974: āsām eva tu gāthāsu mahārāṣṭrīṃ prayojayet // VisSd_6.159 //
GK16visvsdpu:984: ceṭānām apy anīcānām api syāt saurasenikā // VisSd_6.164 //
GK16visvsdpu:986: unmattānām āturāṇāṃ saiva syāt saṃskṛtaṃ kvacit // VisSd_6.165 //
GK16visvsdpu:999: nidarśanābhiprāyo ca prāptir vicāra eva ca // VisSd_6.172 //
GK16visvsdpu:1003: pṛcchā prasiddhiḥ sārūpyaṃ saṃkṣepo guṇa-kīrtanam // VisSd_6.174 //
GK16visvsdpu:1005: lakṣaṇāni guṇaiḥ sālaṅkārair yogas tu bhūṣaṇam // VisSd_6.175 //
GK16visvsdpu:1007: siddhair arthaiḥ samaṃ yatrāprasiddho 'rthaḥ prakāśate // VisSd_6.176 //
GK16visvsdpu:1011: hetur vākyaṃ samāsoktam iṣṭakṛd dhetu-darśanāt // VisSd_6.178 //
GK16visvsdpu:1013: dṛṣṭānto yas tu pakṣe 'rtha-sādhanāya nidarśanam // VisSd_6.179 //
GK16visvsdpu:1015: sañcayo 'rthānurūpo yaḥ padānāṃ sa padoccayaḥ // VisSd_6.180 //
GK16visvsdpu:1019: prāptiḥ kenacid aṃśena kiñcid yatrānumīyate // VisSd_6.182 //
GK16visvsdpu:1023: guṇātipātaḥ kāryaṃ vad viparītaṃ guṇān prati // VisSd_6.184 //
GK16visvsdpu:1024: yaḥ sāmān guṇodrekaḥ sa guṇātiśayo mataḥ /

GK16visvsdpu:1028: dṛptādīnāṃ bhavad bhraṃśo vācyād anyatarad vacaḥ /
GK16visvsdpu:1031: vākyaiḥ snigdhair anunayo bhaved arthasya sādhanam // VisSd_6.188 //
GK16visvsdpu:1034: dūṣaṇodghoṣaṇāyāṃ tu bhartsanā garhaṇaṃ tu tat /
GK16visvsdpu:1038: saṅkṣepo yat tu saṅkṣepād ātmāny arthe prayujyate /
GK16visvsdpu:1039: guṇānāṃ kīrtanaṃ yat tu tad eva guṇa-kīrtanam // VisSd_6.192 //
GK16visvsdpu:1040: sa leśo bhaṇyate vākyaṃ yat sādṛśya-puraḥsaram /
GK16visvsdpu:1041: manorathas tv abhiprāyasyoktir bhaṅgyantareṇa yat // VisSd_6.193 //
GK16visvsdpu:1043: syāt prayāṇayituṃ pūjyaṃ priyoktir harṣa-bhāṣaṇam // VisSd_6.194 //
GK16visvsdpu:1049: utkīrtanaṃ yathā yācñā parihāro nivedanam // VisSd_6.197 //
GK16visvsdpu:1053: kapaṭaṃ māyayā yatra rūpam anyad vibhāvyate // VisSd_6.199 //
GK16visvsdpu:1054: akṣamā sā paribhavaḥ svalpo 'pi na viṣahyate /
GK16visvsdpu:1058: ākāṅkṣā ramaṇīyatvāḍ vastuno yā spṛhā tu sā /
GK16visvsdpu:1059: adhikṣepa-vacaḥ-kārī kṣobhaḥ proktaḥ sa eva tu // VisSd_6.202 //
GK16visvsdpu:1066: bhartsanā tu parīvādo nītiḥ śāstreṇa vartanam /
GK16visvsdpu:1067: uktasyārthasya yat tu syād utkīrtanam anekadhā // VisSd_6.206 //
GK16visvsdpu:1069: protsāhnaṃ syād utsāha-girā kasyāpi yojanam // VisSd_6.207 //
GK16visvsdpu:1070: sāhāyyaṃ saṅkaṭe yat syāt sānukūlyaṃ parasya ca /
GK16visvsdpu:1071: abhimānaḥ sa eva syāt praśrayād anuvartanam // VisSd_6.208 //
GK16visvsdpu:1073: yācñā tu kvāpi yācñā yā svayaṃ dūta-mukhena vā // VisSd_6.209 //
GK16visvsdpu:1076: pravartanaṃ tu kāryasya yat syāt sādhu-pravartanam /
GK16visvsdpu:1082: lāsye daśavidhaṃ hy etad-aṅgam uktaṃ manīṣibhiḥ /
GK16visvsdpu:1084: śuddhaṃ gānaṃ geya-padaṃ sthita-pāṭhyaṃ tad ucyate /
GK16visvsdpu:1085: madanottāpitā yatra paṭhati prākṛtaṃ sthitā // VisSd_6.215 //
GK16visvsdpu:1087: aprasādhita-gātraṃ yad āsīnāsīnam eva tat // VisSd_6.216 //
GK16visvsdpu:1091: vīṇā-puraḥ-saraṃ gānaṃ striyāḥ pracchedako mataḥ // VisSd_6.218 //

GK16visvsdpu:1102: aṅkaiś ca daśabhir dhīrā mahānāṭakam ūcire /

GK16visvsdpu:1106: nāyikā kulajā kvāpi veśyā kvāpi dvayaṃ kvacit /
GK16visvsdpu:1107: tena bhedās trayas tasya tatra bhedas tṛtīyakaḥ // VisSd_6.226 //
GK16visvsdpu:1110: ekāṅka eka evātra nipuṇaḥ paṇḍito viṭaḥ /
GK16visvsdpu:1111: raṅge prakāśayet svenānubhūtam itareṇa vā // VisSd_6.228 //
GK16visvsdpu:1115: mukha-nirvahaṇe sandhī lāsyāṅgāni daśāpi ca // VisSd_6.230 //
GK16visvsdpu:1117: hīno garbha-vimarśābhyāṃ narair bahubhir āśritaḥ // VisSd_6.231 //
GK16visvsdpu:1120: rājarṣir atha divyo vā bhaved dhīroddhataś ca saḥ /

GK16visvsdpu:1124: sandhī dvāv antyayos tadvad eka eko bhavet punaḥ /
GK16visvsdpu:1126: phalaṃ pṛthak pṛthak teṣāṃ vīra-mukhyo 'khilo rasaḥ /
GK16visvsdpu:1128: vīthy-aṅgāni ca tatra syur yathālābhaṃ trayodaśa /
GK16visvsdpu:1129: gāyatry-uṣṇiṅ-mukhāny atra cchandāṃsi vividhāni ca // VisSd_6.237 //
GK16visvsdpu:1133: dharmārtha-kāmais trividhaḥ śṛṅgāraḥ kapaṭaḥ punaḥ // VisSd_6.239 //
GK16visvsdpu:1134: svābhāvikaḥ kṛtrimaś ca daivajo vidravaḥ punaḥ /

GK16visvsdpu:1137: aparāgaiś ca bhūyiṣṭho ḍimaḥ khyātetivṛttakaḥ // VisSd_6.241 //

GK16visvsdpu:1147: khyātau dhīroddhatāv anyo gūḍha-bhāvād ayukta-kṛt // VisSd_6.246 //
GK16visvsdpu:1149: śṛṅgārābhāsam apy asya kiñcit kiñcit pradarśayet // VisSd_6.247 //

GK16visvsdpu:1152: mahātmāno vadha-prāptā api vadhyāḥ syur atra no /

GK16visvsdpu:1155: utsṛṣṭikāṅka ekāṅko netāraḥ prākṛtā narāḥ // VisSd_6.250 //
GK16visvsdpu:1157: prakhyātam itivṛttaṃ ca kavir buddhyā prapañcayet // VisSd_6.251 //
GK16visvsdpu:1159: yuddhaṃ ca vācā kartavyaṃ nirveda-vacanaṃ bahu // VisSd_6.252 //

GK16visvsdpu:1162: sūcayed bhūri śṛṅgāraṃ kiñcid anyān rasān prati /

GK16visvsdpu:1171: anye tvāhuś chalaṃ kiñcit kāryam uddiśya kasyacit // VisSd_6.258 //
GK16visvsdpu:1175: gaṇḍaṃ prastuta-saṃbandhi bhinnārthaṃ satvaraṃ vacaḥ // VisSd_6.260 //
GK16visvsdpu:1177: prahelikaiva hāsyena yuktā bhavati nālikā // VisSd_6.261 //
GK16visvsdpu:1179: agṛhṇato 'pi mūrkhasya puro yac ca hitaṃ vacaḥ // VisSd_6.262 //
GK16visvsdpu:1181: doṣā guṇā guṇā doṣā yatra syur mṛdavaṃ hi tat // VisSd_6.263 //
GK16visvsdpu:1183: bhavet prahasanaṃ vṛttaṃ nindyānāṃ kavi-kalpitam // VisSd_6.264 //
GK16visvsdpu:1185: aṅgī hāsya-rasas tatra vīthy-aṅgānāṃ sthitir na vā // VisSd_6.265 //

GK16visvsdpu:1194: prakhyāto dhīra-lalitas tatra syān nāyako nṛpaḥ // VisSd_6.269 //
GK16visvsdpu:1198: devī bhavet punar jyeṣṭhā pragalbhā nṛpa-vaṃśajā // VisSd_6.271 //
GK16visvsdpu:1199: pade pade mānavatī tad-vaśaḥ saṅgamo dvayoḥ /
GK16visvsdpu:1200: vṛttiḥ syāt kaiśikī svalpa-vimarśāḥ sandhayaḥ punaḥ // VisSd_6.272 //
GK16visvsdpu:1202: troṭakaṃ nāma tat prāhuḥ pratyaṅkaṃ saṃvidūṣaṇam // VisSd_6.273 //
GK16visvsdpu:1203: prākṛtair navabhiḥ pumbhir daśabhir vāpy alaṅkṛtā /
GK16visvsdpu:1208: na ca viṣkambhako 'py atra pracuraś cādbhuto rasaḥ // VisSd_6.276 //
GK16visvsdpu:1209: aṅkā javanikākhyāḥ syuḥ syād anyan nāṭikāsamam /
GK16visvsdpu:1212: hāsyo 'ṅgy atra sa-śṛṅgāro nārī vāsaka-sajjikā // VisSd_6.278 //
GK16visvsdpu:1214: kecit pratimukhaṃ sandhim iha necchanti kevalam // VisSd_6.279 //
GK16visvsdpu:1215: prasthāne nāyako dāso hīnaḥ syād upanāyakaḥ /
GK16visvsdpu:1216: dāsī ca nāyikā vṛttiḥ kaiśikī bhāratī tathā // VisSd_6.280 //
GK16visvsdpu:1218: aṅkau dvau laya-tālādir vilāso bahulas tathā // VisSd_6.281 //
GK16visvsdpu:1222: catasro nāyikās tatra trayo 'ṅkā iti kecana // VisSd_6.283 //
GK16visvsdpu:1226: netā strī cāpy udāttātra sandhī ādyau tathāntimaḥ // VisSd_6.285 //
GK16visvsdpu:1230: nepathye gīyate nāndī tathā tatra prarocanā // VisSd_6.287 //
GK16visvsdpu:1236: iha pratimukhaṃ sandhim api kecit pracakṣate // VisSd_6.290 //
GK16visvsdpu:1237: saṃlāpike 'ṅkāś catvāras trayo vā nāyakaḥ punaḥ /

GK16visvsdpu:1244: mataṃ śrī-gaditaṃ nāma vidvadbhir uparūpakam // VisSd_6.294 //
GK16visvsdpu:1245: śrīr āsīnā śrī-gadite gāyet kiṃcit paṭhed api /
GK16visvsdpu:1246: ekāṅko bhāratī-prāya iti kecit pracakṣate // VisSd_6.295 //
GK16visvsdpu:1247: catvāraḥ śilpake 'ṅkāḥ syuś catasro vṛttayas tathā /
GK16visvsdpu:1248: aśānta-hāsyāś ca rasā nāyako brāhmaṇo mataḥ // VisSd_6.296 //
GK16visvsdpu:1250: saptaviṃśatir aṅgāni bhavanty etasya tāni tu // VisSd_6.297 //
GK16visvsdpu:1256: camatkṛtiś cety amīṣāṃ spaṣṭatvāl lakṣma nocyate // VisSd_6.300 //
GK16visvsdpu:1260: svalpavattā sunepathyā vikhyātā sā vilāsikā // VisSd_6.302 //
GK16visvsdpu:1266: caturtho daśanāliḥ syād aṅkaḥ krīḍita-nāgaraḥ // VisSd_6.305 //
GK16visvsdpu:1268: samāna-vaṃśajā netur bhaved yatra ca nāyikā // VisSd_6.306 //
GK16visvsdpu:1269: hallīśa eka evāṅkaḥ saptāṣṭau daśa vā striyaḥ /
GK16visvsdpu:1275: upanyāso 'tha vinyāso virodhaḥ sādhvasaṃ tathā // VisSd_6.309 //
GK16visvsdpu:1276: samarpaṇaṃ nivṛttiś ca saṃhāra iti saptamaḥ /
GK16visvsdpu:1277: upanyāsaḥ prasaṅgena bhavet kāryasya kīrtanam // VisSd_6.310 //
GK16visvsdpu:1279: bhrānti-nāśo vibodhaḥ syān mithyākhyānaṃ tu sādhvasam // VisSd_6.311 //
GK16visvsdpu:1282: saṃhāra iti ca prāhur yat-kāryasya samāpanam /

GK16visvsdpu:1286: kalāpakaṃ caturbhiś ca pañcabhiḥ kulakaṃ matam /
GK16visvsdpu:1287: sarga-bandho mahā-kāvyaṃ tatraiko nāyakaḥ suraḥ // VisSd_6.315 //
GK16visvsdpu:1289: eka-vaṃśa-bhavā bhūpāḥ kulajā bahavo 'pi vā // VisSd_6.316 //
GK16visvsdpu:1291: aṅgāni sarve 'pi rasāḥ sarve nāṭaka-sandhayaḥ // VisSd_6.317 //
GK16visvsdpu:1293: catvāras tasya vargāḥ syus teṣv ekaṃ ca phalaṃ bhavet // VisSd_6.318 //
GK16visvsdpu:1294: ādau namaskriyāśīr vā vastu-nirdeśa eva vā /
GK16visvsdpu:1295: kvacin nindā khalādīnāṃ satāṃ ca guṇa-kīrtanam // VisSd_6.319 //
